<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes user added action (see [[addAction]]) menu item text. <br><br>

Since Arma 3 v1.61.136587 it is possible to set 2 more optional texts, one for background and one for foreground when action is displayed on the screen (''showWindow'' <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[true]])<br><br>
[[Image:setUserActionText.jpg|500px]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''setUserActionText''' [actionIndex, textMenu, textWindowBackground, textWindowForeground]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - object the action is added to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [actionIndex, textMenu, textWindowBackground, textWindowForeground] : [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> actionIndex: [[Number]] - action id returned by [[addAction]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> textMenu: [[String]] or [[Structured Text]] - Text title shown in scroll action menu
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> textWindowBackground (Optional): [[String]] or [[Structured Text]] - Text displayed at background (''Since Arma 3 v1.61.136587'')
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> textWindowForeground (Optional): [[String]] or [[Structured Text]] - Text displayed at foreground (''Since Arma 3 v1.61.136587'')

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_id = [[player]] [[addAction]] ["Hello", ""];
[[player]] [[setUserActionText]] [_id, "Good Bye"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_id = billboard [[addAction]] ["Some Action", {}];
billboard [[setUserActionText]] [
	_id, 
	"Some Action", 
	<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>"<t color='#ff0000'>Background-----------------</t><br>Multiline<br>Multiline<br>Multiline<br>. . ."</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>, 
	<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>"<t color='#00ff00'>-----------------Foreground</t>"</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionIDs]], [[actionParams]], [[addAction]], [[inGameUISetEventHandler]], [[showHUD]], [[inputAction]], [[removeAction]], [[removeAllActions]], [[action]]
</value></part></template>
